备注: 每道题必须包含以下四条数据:
Q: 问题, 空必须为 7 个下划线
A: 答案, 列表格式, 可以有多个答案
ana: 解析，英文(半角)标点加空格，中文(全角)标点不要带空格
tags: 考点, 特点相关标签

questions.Q: When fat and salt _______ (remove) from food, the food tastes as if it is missing something.
questions.ana: 一般现在时的被动语态。

questions.Q: _______ (learn) more about Chinese culture, Jack has decided to take Chinese folk music as an elective course.
questions.ana: 根据句式分析，该题有一个谓语，且无连词，故应填非谓语，根据句意可知此处表目的，故填 To learn。

questions.Q: Much time _______ (spend) sitting at a desk, office workers are generally troubled by health problems.
questions.ana: 根据句式分析，该题只有一个谓语，且无连词，尽管前半句很长，但也应填非谓语，“spend”与“much time”之间为被动关系，故填过去分词 spent。

questions.Q: Children, when _______ (accompany) by their parents, are allowed to enter the stadium.
questions.ana: 本题考查非谓语动词作状语。主语“children”与“accompany”之间为逻辑上的被动关系。

questions.Q: In the last few years, China _______ (make) great achievements in environmental protection.
questions.ana: 根据时间状语“in the last few years”可知，此处使用现在完成时态，主语与“make”之间为主动关系，且为单数。

questions.Q: The book I wrote last year _______ (print) and it will soon come out.
questions.ana: 根据“It will soon come out”可知当前正在印刷中，“the book”与“print”之间为被动关系，故用现在进行时态的被动语态。

questions.Q: Just as I got to the school gate, I realized I _______ (leave) my book in the cafe.
questions.ana: “realized”为一般过去时，其后面宾语从句中的动作发生在其之前，故用过去完成时。

questions.Q: _______ (work) for two days, Steve managed to finish his report on schedule.
questions.ana: 此处为非谓语动词作状语结构，句子主语“Steve”为“work”的逻辑主语，两者为主动关系，且“work” 表示的动作发生在谓语动作之前，故用现在分词的完成式。

questions.Q: _______ (raise) in the poorest area of Glasgow, he had a long, hard road to becoming a football star.
questions.ana: raise的逻辑主语是句子主语he，两者之间为被动关系，故填Raised。

questions.Q: The film star wears sunglasses. Therefore, he can go shopping without _______ (recognize).
questions.ana: “without” 为介词，后接动名词形式，“recognize”与“he”为逻辑上的被动关系，故答案为 being recognized

questions.Q: _______ (amaze) at his final score, he decided to treat himself to a big dinner.
questions.ana: 其逻辑主语为“he”，两者从汉语理解上为主动关系，而实际结构应是“be amazed at”，即为被动关系，故填 Amazed

questions.Q: He _______ (addict) to computer games, his parents were very worried about his future.
questions.ana: addict的逻辑主语是“he”而不是“his parents”，所以该题为独立主格结构，(be) addicted to“沉溺于……”。故填addicted。

questions.Q: In my hometown, there is always a harvest supper for the farmers after all the wheat _______ (cut).
questions.ana: 从句中 cut 的动作发生在主句动作之前，主句是一般现在时，故该从句使用一般现在时或现在完成时，且“wheat”与“cut”之间为被动，故答案是 has been cut。

questions.Q: I _______ (not exercise) for six months. I'm really out of shape.
questions.ana: 根据“I' m really out of shape”说明主语缺乏锻炼造成的，故用现在完成时，表示对现在造成的影响。

questions.Q: I went to see Dr Smith yesterday, only to be told that he _______ (ask) for leave.
questions.ana: 根据“went”可知该语境发生在过去，因此“ask for leave”发生在“went” 这一动作前，故用过去完成时。

questions.Q: Tom is a great talker. It's high time he _______ (do) something instead of just talking.
questions.ana: 考查固定句式“It' s high time + 从句”，从句中使用一般过去时态。

questions.Q: This ferryboat _______ (use) to transport passengers between the harbor and the island for years.
questions.ana: 根据 for years 及语义理解可知使用现在完成时态，另外“this ferryboat”与“use”之间为被动关系，故填 has been used。

questions.Q: He _______ (work) around the clock since June, when the first Ebola case appeared in this agricultural country.
questions.ana: 根据时间状语 since June 可确定使用现在完成时，另由“around the clock”可知主语从未停止过工作，故填现在完成进行时。

questions.Q: One of the most effective ways to reduce _______ (anxious) is to talk about feelings with someone you trust.
questions.ana: 动词后填名词作宾语。

questions.Q: He gave himself a new name to hide his _______ (identify) when he went to carry out the secret task.
questions.ana: identify 动词 → identity 名词

questions.Q: While she was in Paris, she developed a _______ (tasty) for fine art.
questions.ana: tasty 形容词 → taste 名词

questions.Q: Andy is content with the toy. It is _______ (good) he has ever got.
questions.ana: 根据句意可知，空格处用形容词的最高级，且最高级前须加定冠词 the。

questions.Q: We can choose our friends, but _______ (usual) we cannot choose our neighbors.
questions.ana: 修饰 but 后的分句，故填副词。

questions.Q: It' s said that the power plant is now _______ (two) as large as what it was.
questions.ana: 根据句式结构可以看出，此处考查“倍数表达法”，two 的倍数表达为 twice。

questions.Q: Doctors use it to learn more about unfamiliar diseases and the _______ (late) medical development.
questions.ana: 根据空前为冠词，空后为名词可知，此处考查形容词作定语。根据语义，“最新的”，应填 latest

questions.Q: We drank together and talked _______ (merry) till far into the night.
questions.ana: 根据空格位于动词之后，可知此处考查副词作状语修饰动词，故填 merrily。

questions.Q: A co-housing community has _______ (private) owned houses and shared land.
questions.ana: 空格位于助动词之后，实义动词之前，故应填副词 privately。
